name: Yubico-perl-client
tagline: AnyEvent based Perl extension for validating YubiKey OTPs against the Yubico Validation Protocol version 2.0
body:
AnyEvent-Yubico
===============

AnyEvent based Perl extension for validating YubiKey OTPs.
Though AnyEvent is used internally, the module does not impose any particular
coding style on the caller. Provides both blocking and non-blocking versions
of OTP verification.

INSTALLATION

To install this module type the following:

   perl Makefile.PL
   make
   make test
   make install

DEPENDENCIES

This module requires these other modules and libraries:

  AnyEvent::HTTP, UUID::Tiny, MIME::Base64, Digest::HMAC_SHA1, 
  URI::Escape, Net::SSLeay
